options.content:
This is a basic overview of all our validators.  
We aim to be 100% transparent, and this is a nice way to have an overview for out delegators and those who are curious.

Consider staking with us!

- [Sentinel](https://www.mintscan.io/sentinel/validators/sentvaloper1rw9wtyhsus7jvx55v3qv5nzun054ma6kz4237k)
- [e-Money](https://www.mintscan.io/emoney/validators/emoneyvaloper1jk4n79c5gv36972ptnly3rvx5nvn3hl3hgly9g)
- [Bitsong](https://www.mintscan.io/bitsong/validators/bitsongvaloper14rvn7anf22e00vj5x3al4w50ns78s7n42rc0ge)
- [Decentr](https://explorer.decentr.net/validators/decentrvaloper1nuhk7uke8ux2h7zpg44u7gyksgkz0fcjpf2074?networkId=mainnet)
- [Nomic](https://app.nomic.io/#/staking?validator=nomic1cugv7uxm0qw749jpjag5tw64k9wj0n3fe8vss5&modal=info)
- [Jackal](https://ping.pub/jackal/staking/jklvaloper1ramqkapjkg0f58vypc43szaqp5juq0ly93t3hm)
- [Cosmos Hub](https://www.mintscan.io/cosmos/validators/cosmosvaloper1xqz9pemz5e5zycaa89kys5aw6m8rhgsvw4328e)

panels.description: Nomic is not included here unfortunately as it's not cosmos-sdk compatible
panels.title: total validators monitored

panels.description: Total amount of all the delegations on all chains we are validating
panels.title: total secured

panels.description: Total number of delegations on all our validators.
panels.title: total delegators

panels.description: Total amount of self-delegated tokens in USD on all the chains we're validating.
panels.title: total self-delegated

panels.description: % of all our self-delegated tokens compared to all our delegations.
panels.title: self-delegated %

panels.description: Total rewards (commission + self-delegated rewards) + collateral (self-delegated tokens) + wallet balance, in USD.
panels.title: total rewards + collateral, $

panels.description: Total amount of delegators by chain.
panels.title: delegators count

panels.description: Total amount of secured tokens in $ on all our validators.
panels.title: delegations - $

panels.description: Validator's position in ranking compared to other validators.
panels.title: validator ranking

panels.description: Voting power of a validator compared to total bonded tokens.
panels.title: voting power %

panels.description: Info about self-delegated tokens
panels.title: self-delegated info

panels.description: Amount of tokens in $ we've self-delegated, per validator.
panels.title: self-delegations amount, $

panels.description: All info on our validators.
panels.title: validators info

panels.description: All info on our validators.
panels.title: chain info

panels.description: How much 1 token costs. Prices taken from Coingecko.
panels.title: Token price, $

panels.description: Validators' missed blocks.
panels.title: missed blocks

panels.description: Amount of blocks the validator hasn't signed in the signing window (usually 10k, can be different from network to network). The lower, the better. If it's above a specific threshold (usually 95%, but also different from chain to chain) the validator goes to jail.
panels.title: Missed blocks counter

panels.description: Validators' unclaimed commission.
panels.title: commission, $

panels.description: Rewards from the tokens staked to ourselves.
panels.title: self-delegated rewards, $

panels.description: Validators' wallet balance.
panels.title: wallet balance, $

panels.description: Validators' rewards (self-delegated rewards + commission).
panels.title: total revenue, $

panels.description: Validators' rewards (self-delegated rewards + commission) + validators' wallet balance + collateral (self-delegated tokens).

targets.expr:
(cosmos_validators_exporter_unclaimed_commission + cosmos_validators_exporter_self_delegated +
cosmos_validators_exporter_wallet_balance + cosmos_validators_exporter_self_delegation_rewards)  / on (chain) group_left cosmos_validators_exporter_denom_coefficient * on (chain) group_left cosmos_validators_exporter_price

panels.title: total revenue + collateral current, $

panels.description: All info on our rewards, everything specified is in tokens.
panels.title: rewards info

panels.description: Total queries amount that have failed. If some RPC is failing a lot of requests, consider switching to another one or buy a better server if it's yours.
panels.title: queries failed

panels.description: Total queries done by cosmos-validators-exporter.
panels.title: queries total
